Description: PLEASE NOTE: This listing is only for the U.S. Lower 48 states. S/N: IS0841582 Used guitar in excellent condition. The worst marks I could find were some superficial scratches on the front near the tone control. I tried to capture them in the last picture. This guitar feels like a tank, solid mahogany and heavy (slightly over 11 lbs by my bathroom scale). I'm assuming the flamed maple is a veneer considering it's origin and price point. The Seymour Duncan P-Rails allow a variety of tonal options: single coil, P90 and humbucker. The guitar did not come with a case but will be securely packed and fully insured for shipping. The price includes insured shipping via UPS Ground to U.S. Lower 48 only. Model name: ESP LTD PB-401FMScale length: 24-3/4" Body wood: mahoganyFinish: polyurethaneColor: dark brownTuners: GroverNut Width: 42mmNeck: mahoganyNeck profile: thin "U" neck contourNeck joint: Set-thru constructionFingerboard: rosewoodFingerboard radius: 13.77" (350mm)Number of frets: 22 Hardware plating: chrome Bridge: Tune-O-Matic with stopbar tailNeck Pickup: Seymour Duncan P-RailBridge Pickup: Seymour Duncan P-RailsControls: volume, tone Pickup selector: 3-way selector switch, 3-way mini-switch for rail-full-split Function
Title: ESP LTD PB-401FM - Duncan P-Rails
